notes.text:
This update for erlang fixes the following issues:

- Updated to version 23.3.4.19 (jsc#PED-6209):
  - CVE-2022-37026: Complete a previous insufficient fix for an
    authentication bypass (bsc#1205318).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Erlang/OTP before 23.3.4.15, 24.x before 24.3.4.2, and 25.x before 25.0.2, there is a Client Authentication Bypass in certain client-certification situations for SSL, TLS, and DTLS.
notes.title: CVE description
